data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_8e459d236f8839e9db8a9af76bfaa333.png

skilllist.skilldesc: After Gord hits an enemy 4 times with Basic Attacks or skills within a short period of time, the next attack on the target will deal an additional 140<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and slow them by 20% for 1s (the slow effect stacks up to 2 times).

Gord conjures a Mystic Orb that bounces in the target direction and explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 270<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area, while stunning them and revealing their locations for 1s.

Gord creates an energy field in the target area, dealing 55<font color="62f8fe"> (+16% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.3s to enemies within (up to 13 times).

Gord unleashes an energy beam in the target direction, dealing 110<font color="62f8fe"> (+32% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit every 0.2s (up to 16 times).

The direction of the beam can be adjusted using the Joystick.

data.name: Gord

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: High damage on Tanks and good sustain.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with skills deals <%Num1> of target's Max HP as extra [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] and restores <%Num2> Mana on hit.########[8098ab]If the hero does not use Mana, recovers <%Num4> HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - SunsetLover
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Dean of the Icarus School of the Magic Academy.

assist.desc: Gord works well with tanky heroes with reliable CCs, like Hylos and Belerick.

strong.desc: Gord is strong against melee heroes with poor Mobility, such as Barats and Fredrinn.

weak.desc: Gord is countered by heroes with gap closers, such as Fanny and Lancelot.
